text:
It would be so nice if HubSpot removed all the JS navigation in the backend!
So many times I cmd+click a button to open in a new tab and it just ignores it! My filters are now all lost… back to 25 per page… back to page 1… urgh:face_with_rolling_eyes:
Just a daily frustration, Do I internet different or is anyone else all about all the tabs!
There should be a HubSpot Developer conference with in-person classes.

Hey <@U05A5G5QVP1> - great idea!

You mean like INBOUND?
I mean, I guess, but there aren't really that many presentations there for developers directly. If they had more, maybe...

Yep - that's so true.
One thing that will be: We(The Developer HUG) will have a "non-just-dev specific" event in August and will be live-streaming from INBOUND every day. Here's the HUG page: <https://events.HubSpot.com/developer/>

You might want to take a look if you're not familiar with the DHUG.
Also feel free to join the DHUG channel <#C078WQGGXPB|dhug-community>.
